mapper.update: INSERT INTO sentence(id,content,video_path,course_id, total_score,accuracy_score,fluency_score,integrity_score,word_score,flag,count) VALUES (#{id},#{content},#{videoPath},#{courseId}, #{totalScore},#{accuracyScore},#{fluencyScore},#{integrityScore},#{wordScore},#{flag},1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_score=#{totalScore},accuracy_score=#{accuracyScore},fluency_score=#{fluencyScore}, integrity_score=#{integrityScore},word_score=#{wordScore},count=count+1
